dt: {bc}to loose from tangles or entanglement {bc}straighten out

pt: {sc}extricate{/sc} {sc}disentangle{/sc} {sc}untangle{/sc} {sc}disencumber{/sc} {sc}disembarrass{/sc} mean to free from what binds or holds back. {sc}extricate{/sc} implies the use of care or ingenuity in freeing from a difficult position or situation.
{sc}disentangle{/sc} and {sc}untangle{/sc} suggest painstaking separation of a thing from other things.
{sc}disencumber{/sc} implies a release from something that clogs or weighs down.
{sc}disembarrass{/sc} suggests a release from something that impedes or hinders.

shortdef: to loose from tangles or entanglement : straighten out
